EnhancedContent:
Finding the right gift for the developers on your list shouldn‚Äôt feel like chasing an intermittent bug. We‚Äôre here to give you our top tips for finding the perfect gift for them. (Or just for you, you know you deserve it.)

![A model wears a GitHub-themed holiday beanie.](https://github.blog/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/hat.png?resize=1024%2C683)

## From vibe code to holiday mode

Move straight from shipping code to holiday mode with the [ugly holiday socks](https://thegithubshop.com/products/ugly-holiday-socks?utm_source=blog&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=holiday_list) and [beanie](https://thegithubshop.com/products/ugly-holiday-beanie?utm_source=blog&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=holiday_list). Made with 49% merino wool, the socks keep your feet warm, while the 100% wool beanie handles the rest. Pair them with the [ugly sweater](https://thegithubshop.com/collections/shop-all/products/1550192-ugly-sweater-v-2024?utm_source=blog&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=holiday_list) to finish the look.

üéÅ And they‚Äôre all included in our [Black Friday sale](https://thegithubshop.com/collections/sale?utm_source=blog&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=holiday_list)‚Äîso grab them before they‚Äôre gone.

![](https://github.blog/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/IMG_0306.jpg?resize=1024%2C566)

## The answer to life‚Äôs biggest questions

‚ÄúShould I push to prod on New Year‚Äôs Eve?‚Äù

‚ÄúShould I eat more of my favorite holiday dish?‚Äù

‚ÄúShould I create another side project in 2026?‚Äù

The [GitHub Copilot Amazeball](https://thegithubshop.com/collections/new-arrivals/products/github-copilot-amazeball?utm_source=blog&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=holiday_list) will have the answer for these questions, and many, many more. It‚Äôll get you on your path. Is it the right path? We don‚Äôt have the answer for that.

![An Asobu bottle with a GitHub logo.](https://github.blog/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/asobu.png?resize=1024%2C683)

## Stay hydrated (and caffeinated)

A good day starts with a coffee, right? We‚Äôve got the solution to all your hot beverage needs, whether you‚Äôre on the go with our [Invertocat orb bottle](https://thegithubshop.com/collections/lifestyle/products/invertocat-orb-bottle), at your desk with our ‚Äú[Ship It‚Äù diner mug](https://thegithubshop.com/collections/lifestyle/products/1548074-00-ship-it-diner-mug)(on sale now) or deep in the forest with our [Invertocat MiiR camp mug](https://thegithubshop.com/collections/lifestyle/products/invertocat-miir-camp-mug) (also works on the school run).

And, of course, staying hydrated is important too, and nothing will help you more than our [Stanley cup](https://thegithubshop.com/collections/lifestyle/products/gh-0016-invertocat-stanley-tumbler?utm_source=blog&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=holiday_list) or [Invertocat Asobu Marina tumbler](https://thegithubshop.com/collections/lifestyle/products/1543072-00-invertocat-asobu-marina-tumbler?utm_source=blog&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=holiday_list) (which also has a coffee cup built in, just saying). Get them both in our [Black Friday sale](https://thegithubshop.com/collections/sale?utm_source=blog&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=holiday_list).

![A GitHub MiiR backpack.](https://github.blog/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/backpack.png?resize=1024%2C683)

## Level up your workspace

Have you seen our [latest key caps](https://thegithubshop.com/collections/lifestyle/products/key-caps-2-0-assorted-pack-of-4)? They may not help you ship code faster, but they do look great. They‚Äôre an easy office gift or the perfect extra touch for a holiday present.

The [recycled desk mat](https://thegithubshop.com/products/1540443-00-recycled-desk-mat) helps your mouse glide smoothly across your workspace. Sophisticated and sleek‚Ä¶ well, not exactly. This desk mat is loud, proud, and unmistakably GitHub‚Äîwith Octocats from edge to edge.

A fan favorite on social media, our [MiiR backpack](https://thegithubshop.com/collections/lifestyle/products/1547139-00-invertocat-miir-c2-ae-laptop-backpack) is here to get you to the office, to the plane and everywhere in between. A holiday must-have.

![A youth model wears a green GitHub sweatshirt.](https://github.blog/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/youth-hoodie.jpg?resize=1024%2C682)

## For future builders

Encourage curiosity early. For the little builders in your life, we have our very cosy [youth ASCII Invertocat pullover](https://thegithubshop.com/products/youth-ascii-invertocat-pullover-hoodie?pr_prod_strat=jac&pr_rec_id=d80962eb7&pr_rec_pid=8418613624920&pr_ref_pid=8418581971032&pr_seq=uniform), along with our [ASCII Invertocat tee](https://thegithubshop.com/products/youth-ascii-invertocat-tee). Want to do some holiday matching? We have the ASCII Cube tee in both [youth](https://thegithubshop.com/collections/apparel/products/youth-ascii-cube-tee) and [adult](https://thegithubshop.com/products/ascii-cube-tee) sizes.

![An 'ugly holiday sweater' featuring GitHub, Mona the Octocat, and Copilot.](https://github.blog/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/sweater.jpg?resize=1024%2C682)

## Take advantage of our Black Friday sale

Giving the perfect gift feels great. Getting it at a solid discount feels even better. From November 26 to December 7, our Black Friday sale offers markdowns on some of these picks and plenty more across the shop. See [everything on sale](https://thegithubshop.com/collections/sale?utm_source=blog&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=holiday_list), and check our [holiday order deadlines](https://thegithubshop.com/pages/shopping-info#shipping) to ensure your gifts arrive on time.

From all of us at the GitHub Shop: here‚Äôs to a December packed with good gifts, good energy, and the occasional sprint to finish that last bit of code. Have a joyful holiday season.
Title: The ultimate gift guide for the developer in your life
Description:
Finding the perfect gift for your favorite developer is easy with our top tips.

The post [The ultimate gift guide for the developer in your life](https://github.blog/news-insights/company-news/the-ultimate-gift-guide-for-the-developer-in-your-life/) appeared first on [The GitHub Blog](https://github.blog).
Author: Lavinia Sfetcu
